statements: DELETE FROM crop_data WHERE crop_id = 100 AND soil_quality = 3;
DELETE FROM crop_data WHERE weather_conditions = 'rainy' AND yield < 50.0;
DELETE FROM soil_quality WHERE soil_type = 'Loamy' AND moisture_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM crop_yield WHERE crop_name = 'Potato' AND yield_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM soil_quality WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND pH_level < 6.5;
DELETE FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature>=30 AND precipitation<=0.1;
DELETE FROM soil_quality WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND pH_level < 6.5;
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM crop_yields WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND date = '2022-08-15';
